title: Dating the Undead
description: They're drop-dead handsome—and we're not kidding!Welcome to the first and only guide devoted to loving the immortal man in all of his furry, feathery, fiery glory. Here is a forbidden-fruit salad of features, fiction, fashion, and more, including:–Lipstick on His CollarIs your immortal just a little bit…immoral?–Angel in the KitchenHeavenly dishes that don't take an eternity to prepare–A Kiss Is Not Just A KissImmortals we crave divulge their lip-smacking turn-ons–Undead & Well-ReadWhat's hot between the covers this month–A View from a GuyZombie Jack's turn–ImmorstrologyOur indispensable guide to heavenly bodies
author: Gena Showalter
